description: Adds animate and replace to page nav params.
replace:
<xf:form action="{{ link('banning/ips/delete') }}" 
		 ajax="true"
		 id="banned-ips"
		 class="block"
		 data-xf-init="ajax-page"
		 data-page="{$page}"
		 data-filter="#banned-ips"
		 data-replace="#banned-ips .block-container, #banned-ips .block-outer with .block-container, .block-outer">
